member.name: P:mjjames.WebControls.jQuery.Type
member.summary: Allows you to specify which jQuery version you want, normal, min, packed - includes a basic check to ensure we dont try to load an invalid type

member.name: P:mjjames.WebControls.jQuery.Path
member.summary: Allows you to specify the location of the jQuery files

member.name: P:mjjames.WebControls.jQuery.Version
member.summary: Specifies the version of jQuery to load 1.2.2 etc
